title: Spicy Orange Chicken
description: Crispy chicken tossed in a sweet and spicy orange sauce.
instructions:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
2. Batter and fry until golden.
3. Simmer sauce ingredients.
4. Toss chicken in sauce.

title: Classic Pumpkin Soup
description: Creamy and comforting pumpkin soup perfect for fall.
instructions:
1. Roast pumpkin chunks.
2. Sauté onion and garlic.
3. Blend pumpkin with broth.
4. Stir in cream and spices.

title: Carrot Cake Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes with the flavors of carrot cake.
instructions:
1. Mix dry ingredients.
2. Whisk wet ingredients.
3. Combine and fold in carrots.
4. Cook on griddle.

title: Honey Teriyaki Salmon
description: Salmon fillet glazed with a sweet and savory honey teriyaki sauce.
instructions:
1. Mix glaze ingredients.
2. Pan-fry salmon.
3. Add glaze and thicken.
4. Garnish with sesame seeds.

title: Sweet Potato Salad
description: Roasted sweet potato salad with a tangy dressing.
instructions:
1. Roast sweet potato chunks.
2. Whisk dressing ingredients.
3. Toss potatoes with dressing.
4. Serve warm or cool.

title: Apricot Glazed Pork Chops
description: Juicy pork chops with a sticky apricot glaze.
instructions:
1. Sear pork chops.
2. Mix glaze ingredients.
3. Brush glaze on chops.
4. Bake until cooked through.

title: Butternut Squash Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with roasted butternut squash.
instructions:
1. Roast squash cubes.
2. Sauté rice and onions.
3. Add broth gradually.
4. Stir in squash and cheese.

title: Orange Creamsicle Smoothie
description: Refreshing smoothie that tastes like an orange creamsicle.
instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients in blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Serve immediately.

title: Thai Red Curry
description: Spicy and aromatic Thai red curry with vegetables.
instructions:
1. Fry curry paste.
2. Add coconut milk.
3. Simmer vegetables.
4. Garnish with basil.

title: Peach Cobbler
description: Warm peach cobbler with a biscuit topping.
instructions:
1. Slice peaches and toss with sugar.
2. Mix batter for topping.
3. Pour batter over peaches.
4. Bake until golden.

title: Turmeric Rice
description: Vibrant yellow rice flavored with turmeric and spices.
instructions:
1. Rinse rice.
2. Sauté spices.
3. Cook rice in broth with spices.
4. Fluff with fork.

title: Avocado Dip with Potatoes
description: Creamy avocado dip served with roasted new potatoes.
instructions:
1. Blend avocado, yogurt, and lime.
2. Boil then roast potatoes.
3. Toss potatoes with spices.
4. Serve with dip.

title: Papaya Boat
description: Breakfast papaya filled with yogurt and granola.
instructions:
1. Halve papaya and scoop seeds.
2. Fill with yogurt.
3. Top with granola and berries.
4. Drizzle with honey.

title: Honey Glazed Carrots
description: Sweet and savory roasted carrots.
instructions:
1. Peel and cut carrots.
2. Melt butter and honey.
3. Toss carrots in mixture.
4. Roast until tender.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlicky shrimp pasta with lemon.
instructions:
1. Cook pasta.
2. Sauté garlic and shrimp.
3. Deglaze with wine.
4. Toss with pasta and lemon.

title: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty lentil soup with vegetables.
instructions:
1. Sauté veggies.
2. Add lentils and broth.
3. Simmer until soft.
4. Stir in spinach.

title: Tangerine Beef
description: Crispy beef strips in a tangerine sauce.
instructions:
1. Coat beef in cornstarch.
2. Fry until crispy.
3. Make sauce with juice and peel.
4. Toss beef in sauce.

title: Passion Fruit Mousse
description: Light and airy passion fruit mousse.
instructions:
1. Mix pulp, sugar, and gelatin.
2. Stir in condensed milk.
3. Fold in beaten egg whites.
4. Chill before serving.

title: Persimmon Salad
description: Winter salad with sweet persimmons.
instructions:
1. Slice persimmons.
2. Arrange on arugula.
3. Sprinkle toppings.
4. Dress with vinaigrette.

title: Macaroni and Cheese
description: Classic creamy mac and cheese.
instructions:
1. Cook macaroni.
2. Make roux with butter and flour.
3. Whisk in milk and cheese.
4. Combine with pasta.

title: Tunisian Orange Cake
description: Moist and fragrant orange cake with olive oil.
instructions:
1. Puree orange with peel.
2. Mix with sugar and oil.
3. Beat eggs and fold in flour.
4. Bake at 375°F for 50 mins.

title: Pumpkin Pie
description: Classic spiced pumpkin pie.
instructions:
1. Mix filling ingredients.
2. Pour into crust.
3. Bake at 425°F for 15 mins.
4. Reduce to 350°F and bake 40 mins.

title: Caramel Apple
description: Crisp apples covered in sticky caramel.
instructions:
1. Wash and dry apples.
2. Melt caramels with cream.
3. Dip apples in caramel.
4. Roll in toppings.
